pr_title: Add HLRC support for simulate index template api

timeline.message: Add HLRC support for simulate index template api.

timeline.bodyText: We validate the indexName in the constructor but maybe we should also validate it here?
timeline.author: dakrone

timeline.bodyText: It seems strange to have a toXContent that produces a body that isn't actually what gets sent (since we don't include the index name in the request body for simulation), do we actually need this method? Can we remove it entirely?
timeline.author: dakrone
